exceptions.exn: In environment addr : Type val : Type The term "Relation" has type "Type -> Type" while it is expected to have type "Relation Heap'" (cannot unify "Heap'" and "Type").

original: apply (Build_UnitalSeparationAlgebra Heap' Relation Join). intros n. specialize (incr_exists n) as [m [H_residue H_increasing]]. exists m. split; auto.
